title: Downloading Leauge on Asus - ROG Desktop - Intel Core i7 - 16GB Memory - 2TB Hard Drive - Black/Red
body: I have been getting a Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable (x64)  download issue on my new computer. It says Error 1935 occured during assembly.

replies.body: Yeah, these errors usually happens on new PCs our dated versions of Windows. Your OS doesn't have the necessary features to install the game, in this case Visual C+++.  You can download it manually [here](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387), but I also recommend updating your Windows to the most recent version first.  That should get you fixed up!

Have you tried and download it from Microsoft website?
https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=21254

You can also try to download this version of LoL installer:
http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/Installer/SingleFileInstall/LeagueOfLegendsBaseEUW.exe

Being a EUW version won't matter, I think it will patch.
